item.title: College Costs Were Flat for Many Years. Now They’re Back on the Rise
item.description: Students may be seeing higher out-of-pocket costs as many colleges hike tuition prices.

item.title: Tariff Checks: Will Trump Actually Send You a $2,000 ‘Dividend’?
item.description: Details about Trump's vision, including income cutoffs, for tariff checks are scarce. But we do know he would need Congress's approval.

item.title: These Are the 10 Most Tax-Friendly States in the U.S.
item.description: These states have the most competitive tax rates, a new report says.

item.title: From Inflation to AI Gift Ideas, Here’s How Holiday Shopping Will Be Different This Year
item.description: "This season, stacking deals isn’t a hack — it’s the new normal," says one expert.

item.title: New Credit Karma Tool Helps You Build Credit With Rent and Utility Payments
item.description: Credit Spark, which is free to use, can report up to two years of past rent, utility and phone bill payments.
